org.openstreetmap.osm.data.coordinates
Class Coordinate

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.osm.data.coordinates.Coordinate
Direct Known Subclasses:
EastNorth, LatLon
public abstract class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object

Base class of points of both coordinate system. The variables are default package protected to allow routines in the data package to access them directly. As the class itself is package protected too, it is not visible outside of the data package. Routines there should only use LatLon or EastNorth

Author:
imi

distance

public double distance(Coordinate other)
Return the squared distance of the northing/easting values between this and the argument.

Parameters:
other - The other point to calculate the distance to.
Returns:
The square of the distance between this and the other point, regarding to the x/y values.
